auth.userSuccessRedirect: your url for user success login ex. http://youpin.city/staff/success
auth.userFailureRedirect: your url for user failure login ex. http://youpin.city/staff/failure
auth.staffSuccessRedirect: your url for staff success login ex. http://youpin.city/staff/success
auth.staffFailureRedirect: your url for staff failure login ex. http://youpin.city/staff/failure

gcs.keyFile: your credentials key file path (usually put under config/gcs/).
